blogs.title: Women on Spacecraft Missions: Are we moving towards parity with the percentage in the field?
blogs.summary: How far have we come and how far do we still need to go to welcome women into planetary science, and, particularly, spacecraft missions?

author.name: Planetary Society Blog
author.description: A guide to interesting stuff going on in space science, space exploration, and space advocacy.
